full_summary:
**Notice of Public Tender**

**Title:** Methane and Ethane Gas Analyzer
**Reference Number:** PW-__PV-960-81354

The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is inviting bids for the supply and delivery of one methane and ethane gas analyzer (hereinafter referred to as "the analyzer") and its accompanying hard-shell carrying case.

**Notice Type:**
Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Competition Type:**
Competitive - Open Bidding
**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), as well as Canada's free trade agreements with Colombia, Peru, Panama, and Korea.

**General Requirements:**

The analyzer must work and operate at all times in accordance with the technical specifications outlined in Annex A of the RFP. This includes:

* One methane and ethane gas analyzer, including power supplies and accessories
* One hard-shell shipping case
* Manuals
* Delivery and virtual training
* One-year warranty, including maintenance and support services

**Evaluation Criteria:**
Bids will be assessed against mandatory technical requirements. A bid must comply with the requirements outlined in the RFP and meet all technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive.

**Bid Requirements:**

* Bids must be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Bid Complete Date:**

Bids are due on September 8, 2022 at 14:00 EST. Late bids will not be accepted.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact:
Cindy O’Gorman
Public Works and Government Services Canada
Laurier Building
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
 Phone: (819) 712-1748
Email: [cindy.o'gorman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:cindy.o'gorman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Important Notice:**
This tender supersedes previous tender number 23240-220524/A, which closed on February 16, 2022. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who submitted a bid on the previous tender.  Delivery of the analyzer and its accompanying hard-shell carrying case is mandatory on or before March 31, 2023.  One year warranty, including maintenance and support
